name: Andhachandrasana
description: Strengthens the spine and improves flexibility in the lower back.

name: Baddha Konasana
description: Opens the hips and groin, reducing hip joint stiffness.

name: Downward Dog
description: Stretches the whole body, improves posture, and reduces back and neck stiffness.

name: Natarajasana
description: Improves balance and stretches the shoulders, chest, thighs, and groin.

name: Triangle Pose
description: Stretches the spine and opens up the chest and shoulders.

name: Utkatakonaasana
description: Strengthens the thighs, hips, and core muscles while improving flexibility.

name: Virabhadrasana
description: Strengthens legs and relieves stiffness in the lower back and knees.

name: Vrikshasana
description: Improves balance and strengthens the legs and ankles.
